resources.string: I am a qualified professional with a degree in Computer Engineering from the Central University Marta Abreu of Las Villas, Cuba, and I have a distinguished track record in the field of computer science and software development. I have worked in various areas of computer engineering, including system design and the implementation of technological solutions. I have had the opportunity to participate in all stages of the software development life cycle, from conceptualization and planning to implementation and maintenance. I have led, worked on, and collaborated in application development projects and optimization of IT systems.
• Deep understanding of software design principles and architecture, as well as patterns like MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel), MVC (Model-View-Controller), and Clean Architecture.
• Ability to create clear technical documentation
• Proficiency in Software (Android Studio, Visual Studio Code)
• Use of version control systems (GitHub, GitLab)

12/2023 - Present: Android Developer at XETID (IT Technologies Company). • Design and development of mobile applications for Android using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose. • Collaboration with UX/UI teams to create intuitive interfaces. • Integration of APIs and data management using REST and JSON. • Execution of unit tests and code debugging. • Maintenance and updates of existing applications, implementing new features as needed. • Technical documentation of processes and development. • Active participation in planning and review meetings, promoting continuous improvement.

2022 - 2023: Intern Front-End Web Developer at XETID (IT Technologies Company). • Participation in the design and development of web applications using Vue.js. • Collaboration with design teams to create attractive and functional user interfaces. • Implementation of reusable components and optimization of application performance. • Integration of RESTful services and data handling using Axios. • Execution of tests and debugging to ensure code quality. • Documentation of processes and development to facilitate project understanding.

2021 - 2023: Active Member of the Student Work Group (GTCE) at the Programming Technologies and Information Systems Laboratory of the Computer Science Research Center (CII) at Central University "Marta Abreu" of Las Villas. • Participation in projects on digital terrestrial signal decoders and Geographic Information Systems. • Collaboration with a multidisciplinary team for the development and implementation of technological solutions. • Research and analysis of emerging technologies applied to programming and information systems. • Support in conducting tests and validation of prototypes developed in the laboratory. • Contribution to technical documentation and presentation of results in academic seminars.
09/2018 - 10/2023 • Computer Engineering • Central University "Marta Abreu" of Las Villas, Villa Clara, Cuba

• Author of the article "DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION FOR PROCESS MANAGEMENT" presented at the II International Symposium "GENERATION AND TRANSFER OF KNOWLEDGE FOR DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION" at the IV International Scientific Convention UCLV 2023.
Central online reservation system for services belonging to governmental, private, or mixed entities.
Coordination and management system for transportation services by agreement between users and transport providers, through its vehicle catalog.
Application designed to manage access to establishments efficiently and securely, simulating the functions of a physical doorman.
Connecting technology and creativity to solve problems.
Developing innovative solutions with passion and dedication.
My main focus is to create intuitive and efficient applications using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose, tools that allow me to deliver exceptional user experiences.

Ticket: Central reservation system, which allows to manage online reservations of services belonging to state, cooperative, private or mixed sector entities, through its service catalog. Among its main functionalities is the reservation in the days and shifts of preference for the user according to the existing availabilities, in case there is no availability, the waiting room can be used as another functionality within Ticket. Payment of the service through secure platforms. Possibility of booking for different beneficiaries. Cancellation of tickets and obtaining the amount paid according to the terms and conditions of each provider. Synchronize reservations with the phone calendar, as well as receive notifications from the system and rate the services received.

The transportation services management application by agreement is an innovative platform designed to facilitate the coordination and administration of transportation services between users and providers. Through an intuitive system, users can request, manage, and monitor personalized transportation services according to their specific needs. The application allows for direct agreements between the parties, ensuring transparency, efficiency, and satisfaction in every trip. With a catalog of options that includes different modes of transport, this tool becomes the ideal solution to optimize logistics and enhance the user experience

Portero is an application designed to manage access to establishments efficiently and securely, simulating the functions of a physical doorman. It allows administrators to control entries and exits, register visitors, and verify credentials using QR codes. The platform offers a real-time alert system and activity reports, ensuring that only authorized individuals enter the premises. With an intuitive interface, Portero optimizes security and enhances the experience for both users and administrators, guaranteeing a controlled and organized environment.
